name: Ambush
text: After setup but before the first round, each friendly model may move 6" and be marked as Hidden: This model may not be targeted by a ranged attack; this model loses hidden if it performs any action

name: Camo
text: When targeting this model with a ranged attack, attackers get a -2 modifier for being obscured rather than -1

name: Fear Aura
text: All enemy models suffer -1 to Nerve tests while within 6" of this model

name: Grunt
text: This model gets -1 on all recovery rolls

name: Invulnerable 5+
text: This model has 5+ invulnerable armor

name: Invulnerable 4+
text: This model has 4+ invulnerable armor

name: Leadership
text: Friendly models within 6" may use this model's NE stat instead of their own

name: MARKSMAN
text: Use when performing a ranged attack before rolling to hit. The attack gets +1 to hit

name: Med Kit
text: Single use item. A model with this item may discard it during its activation to recover 1 wound

name: Melee Hit Aura
text: You can re-roll melee hit rolls of 1 for friendly models within 6" of this model

name: Armor +1
text: This models AR is improved by 1

name: Command Points +1
text: This model gets one additional CP

name: Nerve +1
text: This models NE is improved by 1

name: Wounds +1
text: This model gets one additional wound

name: Prevent Disengage
text: When performing a disengaging attack, you may choose to deal no damage and instead the enemy model's move ends immediately

name: Regeneration
text: Use during the end phase. This model may heal one wound. A model may only use this ability once per round

name: Reroll Nerve
text: You can reroll Nerve tests for this model

name: Reroll Recovery
text: You can reroll recovery rolls for this model

name: Hit Reroll Aura
text: For the rest of the turn, you can reroll hit rolls of 1 for friendly models within 6‚Äù of this model

name: Resilient
text: This model gets +1 on all recovery rolls

name: Stim Pack
text: Single use item. A fatigued model with this item may discard it during the End Phase to become un-fatigued

name: Swift Charge
text: This model gains +1 SP while making a Charge action

name: Terror
text: Enemy models suffer -1 to all Nerve tests while within 3" of this model

name: Toxin Sacs
text: Melee hits that roll a natural 6 are resolved with +1 D
